name: DGCP | MaMeeFarm™ — Proof 402 30 Baht Meal for Two: Daily Labor Evidence
description:
This proof documents a daily survival meal prepared at MaMeeFarm™ on
28 December 2025, 09:46 (local time).

Pork was purchased from the local village using 30 THB, intended to provide food for two people (MaMee and P’To) for the entire day.
The image records the act of cooking as real labor—transforming limited cash into sustenance through time, effort, and skill.

This is not a story of cuisine, but a verifiable unit of labor, cost, and survival economics, captured in real time.

Under DGCP principles, this proof anchors:

micro-economy reality,

labor input,

consumption planning,
all without narrative inflation or retrospective editing.
